name: Sharknado 2: The Second One (Extended Version)
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

L.A. Sharknado survivor Fin arrives in New York as a massive storm begins to pummel the city. Just as Fin realizes this is no ordinary squall, tornadoes full of sharks appear on the horizon. Soon, no vehicle, building, or national monument is safe from the destruction, and Fin must make the perilous journey across town to rescue his family before they, and all of New York, are turned into chum.

short_description: When a Category 7 hurricane pummels New York, the surging flood waters bring thousands of sharks. To make matters worse, tornadoes soon dot the horizon. As Sharknadoes tear through the city, no vehicle, building, or national monument is safe.
